mapper.select: SELECT oi.* , c.`name` as customer_name ,p.product_code,p.`product_name`,p.`model` as product_model FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN `customer_info` c ON oi.`customer_id` = c.`id` LEFT JOIN `product_info` p ON oi.`customer_product_code` = p.`customer_product_code` where 1=1 and oi.`order_no` like CONCAT('%',#{orderNo},'%') and oi.`customer_product_code` like CONCAT('%',#{customerProductCode},'%') and oi.`status` =#{status} and oi.`create_time` >= #{startTime} and oi.`create_time` <= #{endTime} order by c.priority desc, oi.create_time desc

SELECT oi.order_no, c.`name` as customer_name , oi.`customer_product_code`, p.product_code, p.product_name, p.`product_name`,p.`model` as product_model, oi.amount as total_amount, oi.delivery_amount, oi.remaining_amount, CASE oi.status WHEN 0 THEN '未全部交货' WHEN 1 THEN '已完成' ELSE '未定义' END AS status, oi.delivery_date, oi.create_time, oi.update_time FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN `customer_info` c ON oi.`customer_id` = c.`id` LEFT JOIN `product_info` p ON oi.`customer_product_code` = p.`customer_product_code` where 1=1 and oi.`order_no` like CONCAT('%',#{orderNo},'%') and oi.`customer_product_code` like CONCAT('%',#{customerProductCode},'%') and oi.`status` =#{status} and oi.`create_time` >= #{startTime} and oi.`create_time` <= #{endTime} order by c.priority desc, oi.create_time desc
